apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji presents a tender moment between two individuals, a man with a medium-light skin tone and another with a light skin tone, leaning in for a kiss. Their faces are softly rendered with gentle curves and subtle highlights, embodying a romantic and affectionate atmosphere. The overall impression is one of warmth and intimacy, perfectly conveying love, passion, and romantic connection through Apple's signature polished and emotionally resonant design language.
